parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.5</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable or disable a control of the currently active user dialog. Disabled controls cannot be clicked onto.

Read [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] for more information about user dialogs and controls. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlEnable''' [idc, enable] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, enable]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - control ID </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - true to enable the control, false to disable it </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> controlName '''ctrlEnable''' enable </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  controlName: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlEnable]] [100, [[false]]]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl [[ctrlEnable]] [[false]]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[ctrlEnabled]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on July 20, 2017 - 11:59 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Yuval|Yuval]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Please do note that enabled controls can gain focus upon click. Therefore do not enable background controls or else they will cover any controls on top of them.<br>
As a general rule of thumb, enabled controls should only be already on the top of the GUI.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes -->
</comment>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 7, 2020 - 22:26 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:R3vo|R3vo]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
One can disable a control when it is loaded by using [[ctrlEnable]] in the [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers#onLoad|onLoad]] event handler.

<code>class MyDialog
{
    class MyControl
    {
        [[User_Interface_Event_Handlers#onLoad|onLoad]] = "([[_this]] [[#]] 0) [[ctrlEnable]] [[false]];";
    };
};</code>

</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
